Reviews.Content: Relatively low rates but I will not stay here again It is a good 30 mins walk from the train station if you know your way. There is no lift access to the rooms. We had a room that faced the car park. It was a late summer so we had to leave the windows open for the night as there is no air conditioning. The next morning we woke up to find ourselves stung quite a few times by mosquitoes. The bathroom is grim and smell of excessive bleach used to try to clean the shower area. The towels are not changed daily which is a real surprise as we have travelled through Italy and this is the first time we find a hotel at this rate that changes your towels only every other day. I will definitely not be returning to this hotel ever again.
Reviews.Author: loyloy

Reviews.Content: Great place to stay in Florence       Room another view
Reviews.Author: david_sTennesse

Reviews.Content: Cosy I loved the look of this place. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was very spacious. There was no tv in the room, but located in the common lounge, which got very smoky at night. You could walk to the duomo, about 20 minute walk, but we opted for bus no. 17, which takes you right in front of the duomo in five minutes. also, we would recommend taking that bus from the s.m.n. rail station to get dropped right in front of the bed and breakfast. The bathroom was not perfectly clean, but manageable.
Reviews.Author: msw_24

Reviews.Content: friendly and comfortable The proprietors are most gracious and helpful, and the bed, in a very spacious room, was the most comfortable we've ever had in Italy. The cost, in March, was very reasonable. Location is about a mile or so from the Duomo, but it's a pleasant walk down the Lungarno. Frequent bus service.
Reviews.Author: Cigno

Reviews.Content: Fantastic Florence bargain You can safely park your car here. Its like an old Tuscan house and beautifully kept. Bathroom was huge, room small but comfy. Concierge was marvellous, lovely seating area downstairs. Decoration etc perfect.Breakfast in bed and again it was just fine. Seated area outside for nice weather. It is a good walk into town, we timed it at 20 minutes but its flat and easy. Nice resturants nearby. Couldnt believe we were in Florence, so quiet and calm. Excellent value for money.
Reviews.Author: vallico2008
